alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:29PM CDT until July 07 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHWESTERN SUMNER AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersville, or 11 miles southeast of Springfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Joelton and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 95 and 110. Interstate 24 between mile markers 33 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
